TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件之前发生控件添加到页。The event occurs before a control is added to a page. 有大量的常见方案，可以在其中将控件添加到页。There are a number of common scenarios where a control can be added to a page. 有关这些的完整说明，请参阅备注部分方法。For a full description of these, see the Remarks section for the method. 类提供了可访问有关正在添加到页面的 Web 部件控件的属性。The class provides access to properties about the Web Parts control being added to the page. 时添加一个控件，它必须检查以查看是否其属性已设置并且，如果是这样，是否控件有权添加到页面。When a control is added, it must be checked to see whether its property has been set and, if so, whether the control is authorized to be added to the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs (Type type, string path, string authorizationFilter, bool isShared);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type, string path, string authorizationFilter, bool isShared) cil managed

param.name: path
param.span: 被授权的控件的源文件的相对应用程序路径（如果该控件为用户控件）。

span.span: The relative application path to the source file for the control being authorized, if the control is a user control.

param.name: authorizationFilter
param.span: 分配给 控件的 属性的任意字符串值，该值用于授权控件是否可以添加到页。

span.span: An arbitrary string value assigned to the property of a control, used for authorizing whether a control can be added to a page.

param.name: isShared
param.span: 指示被检查授权情况的控件是否为共享控件，共享意味着它对应用程序的许多用户或所有用户可见，并且其 属性值设为 。

span.span: Indicates whether the control being checked for authorization is a shared control, meaning that it is visible to many or all users of the application, and its property value is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享的 Web 部件控件是对 Web 页的所有用户可见。A shared Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web page. 与相对的共享控制是每个用户控件，这是特定于用户的并且仅对该控件添加到页面的用户可见。The opposite of a shared control is a per-user control, which is user-specific and is visible only to the user who added that control to the page. 如果用户在共享个性化设置作用域中查看页面时，会添加一个动态控件，将共享控件。If a dynamic control is added while a user is viewing the page in shared personalization scope, the control will be shared. 如果该控件将添加用户时用户个性化设置作用域中,该控件的属性值将为`false`。If the control is added while the user is in user personalization scope, the property value for that control will be `false`. 有关详细信息共享和每个用户控件，请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information about shared and per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
